Health Care Worker and First Responder Social Security Beneficiary Choice Act of 2022
To provide for the exemption of certain earnings from the retirement earnings test, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary:
Health Care Worker and First Responder Social Security Beneficiary Choice Act of 2022
This bill excludes wages from employment in the health care workforce or as a first responder during public health emergencies, including the COVID-19 emergency, from income limits that apply to Social Security retirement benefits.
